Providence.Samuel B. Conant House: The Samuel B. Conant House is an historic house at 104 Clay Street in Central Falls, Rhode Island. This 2-1/2 story structure was built in 1895 for Samuel Conant, president of a Pawtucket printing firm, and is one of the city's finest Colonial Revival houses. Its exterior is brick on the first floor and clapboard above, beneath a gambrel roof punctured by several gable dormers.
